response.overview: Take a peek at the way it couild be if only men would cooperate.  Gather around, the show's about to begin.  It's guaranteed to astound and amaze, and promises to leave you fulfilled, appreciated and weak in the knees.  What more could a woman want?  Peep Show is an award-winning live-action short film which offers an hysterical glimpse into an imaginary world where a woman is at the controls of a fictitious peep show booth, and two men are employed to make all of her dreams come true.  So grab a seat, the pleasure is about to begin.  You've earned it!
response.title: Peep Show
